main event: Two civilians reported seeing a bright light moving at high speed over Walla Walla, Washington, on April 21, 1952.
interesting points: The object was described as circular with a concave leading edge,The sighting occurred at approximately 10:50 p.m.,The object was seen in daylight and was gray in color,Witnesses estimated the object was flying at an altitude of about 15,000 ft with no exhaust trail visible,The object appeared to be traveling at a speed of 500-600 m.p.h.
sighted object: a bright light moving at high speed
witness description: civilians employed by Walla Walla Canning Co.
